author: Yakumo Chen

text:
@Juan Valencia
 So that's why the music from both games sound so similar! xD
author: nikki

text: @maxemidian Yep. Same composer.
author: Juan Valencia

text: @Juan Valencia While Grounseed does share the same composers as YU-NO (Ryu Umemoto (RIP) and Ryu Takami), the game is not by elf. It's actually developed by another company by the name of Studio Twinkle. Furthermore, Grounseed is more of an RPG than visual novel, even though it does have VN elements like drawn cutscenes.
author: FMFlameNinja

text:
And particularly the main composers are flipped in regard to both games. 

The main composer in Grounseed is Ryu Takami while Ryu Umemoto only did a couple of tracks. In Yu-No it's the other way around, Ryu Umemoto is the main composer and Ryu Takami only worked on a couple of tracks.
